abstract: The developers of Scrabulous have blocked U.S. and Canadian users from playing the popular Facebook game a week after Hasbro sued to block the copycat of its Scrabble word game.
snippet: The developers of Scrabulous have blocked U.S. and Canadian users from playing the popular Facebook game a week after Hasbro sued to block the copycat of its Scrabble word game.
lead_paragraph: UPDATED 11:00 a.m.| Facebook says the decision to block Scrabulous for U.S. and Canadian users was made by the Scrabulous developers, not Facebook.

headline.main: Game Over: Scrabulous Shut Down on Facebook
